<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Prescient Consumable](/Feats.aspx?ID=2142) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 208 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Prescient Planner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2143)

</column>

---

You can predict which consumables you might need in advance. When using [Prescient Planner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2143), you can procure a [consumable](/equipment/consumables) item from your [backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), instead of a piece of adventuring gear. The consumable item must still be common with a level no higher than half your level, and its Bulk must be low enough that carrying it wouldn't have made you [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12).
name: Prescient Consumable
